嫹字的基本解释

嫹
miáo
古同“媌”，美好的样子。

嫹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miáo］
［《廣韻》莫交切，平肴，明。］
［《廣韻》莫飽切，上巧，明。］
亦作“嫹1”。
纤美；美好。

嫹字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嫹； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页271第02
【字彙】莫交切，音茅。美好貌。　又莫巧切，音卯。義同。【正字通】切聲不諧，義訓無據，沿篇海而誤。

嫹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嫹字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［miáo］
["Guangyun" must not be cross-cut, flat food, bright. ]
["Guangyun" is not full of cuts, clever, clear. ]
Also known as "嫹1".
Slim; beautiful.
嫹
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嫹; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 271 02
[Vocabulary] Do not cross cut, Yin Mao. Good looking.　Mo Qiao cut again, sound mao. The same meaning. [Zhengzitong] The sound is inharmonious, and there is no evidence for righteousness, and it is wrong along the sea.
